main event: Several witnesses reported seeing bright red lights moving in the sky over Saratoga Springs, New York on June 23, 1967.
interesting points: Two boys camping spotted a huge glowing object streaking upward,Two Greenfield women reported seeing two large glowing objects moving in the sky, A Vermont man claimed his car engine died when he saw a battle-shaped object rising behind trees, The Saratoga Springs Radar station did not track any objects during the incident, Observers claimed the lights observed may have been reflections of bright lights.
witness description: two boys, two women, and one man
